title: [Caffe2] Fix missing include dirs of gflags and glog
body_html:
We didn't see this earlier because these include dirs coincide with those of opencv and other packages, so including those packages covers the include dirs of gflags and glog.

Also changing gflags to gflags::gflags for consistency with the other imported targets. EDIT actually I removed this change.
